# Useful and optional Python dependencies
pylint          # Test dependency
aiosmtpd        # Test dependency
astroid         # Test dependency
dbfread         # `account_winbooks_import` dependency
debugpy         # Debugger for Python
fonttools       # `odoo/tools/pdf` dependency
google-auth     # `cloud_storage_google` and `social_push_notifications` dependency
jwt             # `l10n_be_hr_payroll_dimona`, `l10n_in_qr_code_bill_scan` and `l10n_in_reports_gstr` dependency
markdown        # `upgrade` and `upgrade-util` dependency
paramiko        # `l10n_be_hr_payroll_dmfa_sftp` dependency
pdfminer.six    # `attachment_indexation` dependency
phonenumbers    # `account_peppol`, `data_cleaning` and `phone_validation` dependency
pydevd-odoo     # Odoo plugin for PyDev, PyCharm and VSCode debugger to work with recordsets
python-slugify  # `base` dependency
suds            # Fallback in `odoo/_monkeypatches` dependency
watchdog        # Allow reloading server on file changes
websocket       # Test and `hw_drivers` dependency
xmlsec          # `l10n_nl_reports_sbr` dependency
